title: 189: Leibniz and the best of all possible worlds
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Leibniz's theory of the best of all possible worlds helps to explain the problem of evil in Theism. "Oh nuh uh" says Voltaire. He wrote Candide in response.
itunes:author: I mean, whoever it is, they're the best
itunes:subtitle: Life is bad but it's the BEST
itunes:summary: Leibniz's theory of the best of all possible worlds helps to explain the problem of evil in Theism. "Oh nuh uh" says Voltaire. He wrote Candide in response.
itunes:title: 189: Leibniz, Candide, and the best of all possible worlds
